Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the significance of the protest by stating that it is the start of weakening Indian democracy and that the media is intentionally not covering it.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that the protest is against EVMs without any political support.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the media is intentionally not covering the protest, without providing any evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The images used in the claim are old and unrelated to the 2019 Lok Sabha elections, suggesting that there may be alternative explanations for the protest.
